item.title: Welcome to Data Beauty Lab
item.description:
Welcome!

Welcome to the Data Beauty Lab, a space to explore the elegance in data, algorithms, and code.

Our Mission

  1. Discover Algorithmic Beauty - from simple rules to complex behaviors
  2. Write Elegant Code - artistic expression in Python
  3. Understand AI Thinking - principles of LLMs and multimodal models
  4. Data Visualization - presenting patterns and structures in text

Read in Chinese
